DOC.brief_summary: Study determine diagnostic accuracy double decidual sac sign predict intrauterine pregnancy prior ultrasonographic visualisation embryonic content use modern ultrasound technology .
DOC.detailed_description: This diagnostic accuracy study conduct following standard report diagnostic accuracy study ( STARD ) guideline . Participants recruit Nurture Fertility , Nottingham , United Kingdom time embryo transfer . If subsequent pregnancy test positive , participant invite attend additional transvaginal ultrasound scan 33-34 day gestation . This scan consider 'index test ' . The index test perform single investigator experience early pregnancy ultrasound follow standard operating procedure use Voluson E8 machine high frequency ( 5-9MHz 9-12MHz ) transvaginal probe . During early scan presence absence follow structure record : intrauterine fluid collection ( define uniformly round , hypoechoic structure echogenic rim ) ; double decidual sac sign ( DDSS ) ( define two concentric echogenic ring tissue surround intraendometrial fluid collection impress upon endometrial stripe ) ; yolk sac ( defined spherical , hyperechoic ring situate eccentrically within gestation sac ) ; fetal pole ( define small linear echogenic structure adjacent yolk sac , side close gestational sac ) . If one intrauterine fluid collection visualize consider separate entity . The finding early scan interpret immediately record separate main clinical note . Participants exclude study point intrauterine fluid collection detect intrauterine fluid collection contain yolk sac fetal pole identify . Referral pathways local Early Pregnancy Assessment Units ( EPAU ) place woman early scan strongly suggestive ectopic pregnancy , example empty endometrial cavity either inhomogenous adnexal mass empty extra-uterine sac yolk sac fetal pole without cardiac activity extra-uterine sac . All woman routine viability ultrasound scan 6 7 week gestation per fertility unit 's standard practice . This viability scan perform appropriately trained doctor nurse follow standard operating procedure use ultrasound equipment index test . This viability scan plus subsequent clinical follow-up require i.e . diagnosis certain follow viability scan alone , constitute reference standard . Clinical follow-up consist repeat transvaginal ultrasound ( TVS ) 7-10 day initial viability scan case pregnancy uncertain viability ( define presence intrauterine gestation sac le 25mm mean diameter obvious yolk sac fetal pole intrauterine gestation sac contain fetal pole le 7mm obvious fetal heart pulsation ) case pregnancy uncertain location ( defined evidence intra- extra-uterine pregnancy retain product conception transvaginal ultrasound scan presence positive urinary pregnancy test ) , referral local EPAU monitoring serial serum human chorionic gonadotropin ( Î²-hCG ) level subsequent ultrasonography possibly surgery indicate accord departmental protocol definitive diagnosis make . Interpretation reference standard perform experienced gynaecologist without knowledge finding index test . Any uncertainty regard final diagnosis dealt seek opinion two senior gynaecologist gain consensus opinion . The outcomes interest intrauterine pregnancy ( may viable non-viable ) ectopic pregnancy . A viable intrauterine pregnancy define ultrasonographic identification intrauterine gestation sac fetal pole length demonstrable fetal heart pulsation . A non-viable intrauterine pregnancy define either empty intrauterine gestation sac mean sac diameter great 25mm intrauterine gestation sac contain fetal pole crown rump length great 7mm demonstrable fetal heart pulsation absence viable embryo , significant increase growth gestation sac length fetal pole two ultrasound scan perform 7 day apart . Where woman undergo surgical medical management miscarriage , histological confirmation product conception obtain possible . Ectopic pregnancies confirm either direct visualisation surgery histological confirmation , , manage medically methotrexate conservatively , unequivocal identification ectopic pregnancy ultrasound scan . Ultrasonographic appearance indicative ectopic pregnancy include : empty endometrial cavity either inhomogenous adnexal mass empty extra-uterine sac yolk sac fetal pole without cardiac activity extra-uterine sac . Following reference standard , pregnancy fall one category exclude study . These include resolve persist pregnancy unknown location . The sensitivity specificity DDSS predict intrauterine pregnancy ( IUP ) estimate follow cross tabulation index test result reference standard . The overall diagnostic accuracy , well positive negative likelihood ratio predictive value , also calculate . Results express percentages ease interpretation 95 % confidence interval also give .
DOC.criteria: Positive urinary pregnancy test perform 18 day oocyte retrieval fresh treatment cycle 1316 day embryo transfer frozen embryo replacement cycle depend stage embryo development time transfer Negative urinary pregnancy test perform 18 day oocyte retrieval fresh treatment cycle 1316 day embryo transfer frozen embryo replacement cycle depend stage embryo development time transfer No evidence intrauterine fluid collection index test Evidence yolk sac and/or fetal pole index test Final diagnosis known
